Name: Mustafa Güven
AboutMe:
I was born in Istanbul in 1982. I have a bachelors degree in both Economics and Information Technology. I have worked as a software developer, IT Manager and IT Consultant. Over the last twelve years, I have developed numerous softwares in; Java, .NET and Android Platforms.

Whilst working for Yapi Kredi Koray Facility Management Inc. as IT manager (2007-2009), I was awarded in the category of “Innovative IT Application’’ by Euromoney. Post military service, I worked as a consultant for PCIS Consulting whom provide support and consultancy to large international companies such as; Phillip Morris, BASF and Akcansa. Between 2011-2012, I continued my professional career as an Android Developer for Kuşman Technology, whom develop solutions for Pharmaceutical Companies. I then, in November 2012, went on to develop mobile applications for Keyfruit Inc.

I am an active member of Support for Modern Life Association and Android Platform Application Developers Group.

For the last 14 years I have played guitar and I sing and write music as a passionate hobby. In my spare time I love to challenge myself with intellectual topics and research science and world history. I love science fiction and am a avid cinema, film and book fan. To keep fit, I love swimming and playing American football of which I played semi-professional for two years.

For further information, please contact me directly on mustafa@mustafaguven.com.tr
